official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Salary Act of 1967 by removing of Members of Congress from the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.

summary.text: Removes, under the Federal Salary Act of 1967, Members of Congress from the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Salary Act of 1967 by removing of Members of Congress from the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.
